Html:
Hello,

I am having problems with the WSUS Package Publisher installation. I checked that the target machine meets the specifications .NET and WSUS versions, the OS is Server 2012 and I installed WPP onto it. When I then attempt to connect to my WSUS server I get an error 'connection failed : request for principal permission failed', I have tried it with or without the server's admin credentials on all possible ports. Any ideas?

jabbche wrote:

I solved this problem and have now connected! Thanks!
